name: netvibes.com Reader: Navigation on top
description: Puts the bottom navigation to the top.
additional_info:
Changelog:

2013-05-31: Facebook-Like removed again, some tweaks
2013-05-29: Minor modifications for header buttons
2013-04-17: Cleaned up the code a bit, removed header height, shrunk header to make editing possible again
2012-08-02: Renamed to "netvibes.com Reader: Navigation on top", tweaked the layout some more, added background color for the navigation bar
2012-07-14: Made some minor changes to layout, navigation bar now takes up less space, elements aligned.
